# GeneQuery

```bash
git clone https://github.com/latur/GeneQuery
cd GeneQuery
```

Usage:

```bash
python3 gq.py [mm|hs|rt] [Entrez Genes list]
```

Example:

```bash
python3 gq.py mm "15368 93692 104263 99929 15417 16770 15275 12576 66681 13358 17133 16948 12111 21366 17859 21753 14735 56174 11535 11541 15937 21985 52231 74747 19252 11674 12831 14387 17684 14121 19017 12457 12209 12177 21983 17886 17035 15211 17319 68507 20527 12575 12767 13636 15116 60406 170750 13638 16833 19309 20198 14828 16476"
```
